name: RelaxingMeditation
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: relaxing meditation
des:
A multitude of relaxing meditations just for you! The few minutes spent will pay back dividends to your long term mental health. To begin invoke the skill with 'Open Relaxing Meditation' and follow the prompts. 

If you like this skill and find it to be a useful addition to your mindfulness practice we would really appreciate if you drop us a review! Any suggestions, questions, or bug reports are welcome at support@stokedskills.com. We'd love to hear your feedback so we can continue to improve our products. Enjoy!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
